name: redbracket-autocad-plugin
description: RedBracket AutoCAD Plugin for CADMATE 2025 Integration

scripts.build: echo 'Building C# project requires Windows and Visual Studio/MSBuild. See BUILD_INSTRUCTIONS.md for details.'
scripts.build:debug: echo 'Debug build requires Windows and Visual Studio/MSBuild. See BUILD_INSTRUCTIONS.md for details.'
scripts.clean: echo 'Clean requires Windows and Visual Studio/MSBuild. See BUILD_INSTRUCTIONS.md for details.'
scripts.restore: echo 'NuGet restore requires Windows and Visual Studio/MSBuild. See BUILD_INSTRUCTIONS.md for details.'
scripts.dev:
node -e "const http = require('http'); const server = http.createServer((req, res) => { res.writeHead(200, {'Content-Type': 'text/html'}); res.end(`RedBracket AutoCAD Plugin

ðŸš¨ RedBracket AutoCAD Plugin

This is NOT a web application!
This is a C# desktop plugin for AutoCAD/CADMATE.

Project Information:

  • Type: C# .NET Framework 4.7.2 AutoCAD Plugin
  • Target: CADMATE 2025 with GRX SDK
  • Platform: Windows x64

To Build This Project:

  1. Use Windows 10+ (64-bit)
  2. Install Visual Studio 2019+
  3. Install CADMATE 2025 with GRX SDK
  4. Open CADPlugIns.sln in Visual Studio
  5. Select Release configuration and x64 platform
  6. Build > Build Solution (F6)

Output Location:

AutocadPlugIn/bin/x64/Release/

Documentation:

See BUILD_INSTRUCTIONS.md for detailed instructions.

This web server is running only to satisfy the development environment. The actual project is built using Visual Studio/MSBuild.

`); }); server.listen(3000, () => console.log('ðŸ“„ Documentation server running on http://localhost:3000'));"
scripts.install: echo 'No Node.js dependencies required for this C# project.'

author: RedBracket
